channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Behind Perrin House in SK Open Space, 25th June
item.description:
The squatters have now gone, leaving huge amounts of rubbish behind. Please arrange clearance both behind Perrin House and between Perrin House and Wordsworth House.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stafford Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On footpath between Nos 36 & 34 Job 7148129, 25th June
item.description:
On footpath between Nos 36 & 34 7148129 This job was originally reported via mobile in the Non-Illuminated bollards category anonymously at 17:52, Monday 17 February 2025 *Unfortunately nobody has come to fix it. They put a cone over broken bollard and a barrier. Today 26th June 9:12 the cone has been taken off and barrier moved against my property. 38 flask walk. Sent to Camden Borough Council less than a minute later. FixMyStreet ref: 7148129. UPDATES CONTRACTORS HAVE BEEN TOLD TO ATTEND SITE in February *Unfortunately site not fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 48, Flask Walk, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress left on pavement, 25th June
item.description:
This mattress was left yesterday, 24/06/2025. It is at the bottom of Stanmore Road, just before no. 2. Children and residents are having to climb over it or walk in the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanmore Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The whole street needs a deep, 25th June
item.description:
Thr whole street behind the shops needs a really good clean. There is rubbish. Spilled liquid all over the street. Also overgrown weed. It's just horrible. Please can someone clean thank you!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Dunbar Avenue, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Something wrong with traffic lights, 25th June
item.description:
While we crossing green man on ourside pedestrian and on car eoad side green . Please check out we nearly got run over. See cameras 25.6.25 at approx 8.36am see car try run us over and prosecuted as we did not see licence plate of black car. Me and 7 year.old nearly got ruin over. Also heck if traffic lights faulty

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harrow Road, Maida Hill, London
